product_vision: To become the go-to mobile application for discovering and reliving the most popular videos from one's youth, fostering a sense of nostalgia and connection across generations.
target_audience: Millennials seeking a nostalgic trip to their childhood and teenage years through popular culture
Gen Z looking to discover the viral video content from before their time
value_proposition: AgeTune offers a unique journey through time, providing users with curated lists of top-played videos from any given age, connecting them with the past's viral moments.

user_stories.story: As a user, I want to select my birth year and see the top videos from each year of my life so that I can relive the nostalgia of those times.
acceptance_criteria: User can select a birth year
App displays a list of top videos for each year since the birth year

features.name: Yearly Video Timeline
features.description: A feature allowing users to view a timeline of top videos from their birth year to the current year.
acceptance_criteria: Timeline is accurately populated with top videos based on the user's birth year

technical_requirements.description: The app must be developed using a microservices architecture to ensure scalability and easy updates.
constraints: Must ensure microservices are loosely coupled

architecture_overview: AgeTune will leverage a microservices architecture for its backend, hosted on AWS to ensure scalability and reliability. The front end will be developed with React for a responsive, app-like experience on web browsers.
dependencies: Spotify API for music video trending data
acceptance_criteria: App must load within 2 seconds on a standard 4G mobile connection
App must support at least 10,000 concurrent users without degradation of performance
metrics_and_kpis: KPI 1: Daily active users (DAU) target is 10,000 within the first 6 months
KPI 2: User retention rate should be at least 40% after 30 days
